meaning list.meaning: Wax aan waligood dhici doonin (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: wax dhumi doona ama fashilmaya (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: sugitaanka fursad, la diyaarin (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: in qof laga tago ama la niyad jabiyo

meaning list.meaning: waqti lumis

meaning list.meaning: waqti wacan

meaning list.meaning: Inaad cabsi ama jirro darteed aad uga muuqato (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: si loo qariyo khalad ama cillad (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: dhammaan, wax walba (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: Iyadoo xamaasad iyo xamaasad weyn leh (halbeeg)
meaning list.sentence: I’ll be at your party with bells on!
meaning list.sentence translation: Waxaan u iman doonaa xisbigaaga farxad weyn!

meaning list.meaning: Abaalmarinta ama darajada la siiyo qofka u dambeeya (halbeeg)
meaning list.sentence: They were awarded the wooden spoon for finishing last in the league.
meaning list.sentence translation: Waxay heleen abaal-marin alwaax ah inay ugu dambeeyaan horyaalka.

meaning list.meaning: si qumman u shaqeeya
meaning list.sentence: This new cleaning product works like a charm.
meaning list.sentence translation: Alaabtan cusub ee nadiifinta ayaa si fiican u shaqeysa.

meaning list.meaning: Waligay ma samayn doono ama xaalad ma ahaan doono (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: Ku soo noqnoqda, sannadba sannadka ka dambeeya, sannado (halbeeg)

meaning list.meaning: fulaynimo, geesinimo (halbeeg)
